titleStmt.title: The life of Dr. Thomas Morton, late Bishop of Duresme begun by R.B. secretary to his Lordship ; and finished by J.N., D.D., his Lordship's chaplain.
titleStmt.author: R. B. (Richard Baddeley)
Naylor, Joseph.
Nelson, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Stephen Bulkley, and are to be sould by Francis Mawbarne,

notesStmt.note: Joint authorship attributed to Joseph (or John) Naylor and Joseph Nelson. Cf. Halk. and Laing; DNB.
Includes frontispiece portrait of Dr. Morton.
Item at reel 1085:13 identified as Wing no. B387 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the British Library.
